name: Shaahin Hessabi
content: Shaahin Hessabi Shaahin Hessabi, Ph.D. Associate Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering Sharif University of Technology Contact Information Email: hessabi (at) sharif (dot) edu Phone: (+9821) 66166638 Google Scholar Page ORCID ID Last Modified: October 2023 Educational Background 1991-95 Ph.D. in Electrical and Computer Engineering University of Waterloo Waterloo, Ontario, Canada 1988-90 M.S. in Electrical Engineering Sharif University of Technology Tehran, Iran 1980-86 B.S. in Electrical Engineering Sharif University of Technology Tehran, Iran Professional Background 2007-Present Associate Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering Sharif University of Technology 1996-2007 Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering Sharif University of Technology Executive Position at the Department/University: 2022-Present Vice Chairman of Graduate Studies Department of Computer Science and Engineering Sharif University of Technology 2014-2016 Head of Hardware Group Department of Computer Science and Engineering Sharif University of Technology 2000-2010 Member of the University Council Sharif University of Technology Honors 1998 and 2004 Distinguished lecturer Department of Computer Science and Engineering Sharif University of Technology
